name: AMFFunction
description: 5G Core Access and Mobility Management Function (AMF) resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vnfParametersList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Parameter set of the VNF instance(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: plmnIdList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of PLMN-Id: Mobile Country Codes (MCC) or Mobile Network Codes(MNC) (3GPP 23.003)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sBIFqdn
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: FQDN of the registered NF instance in service-based interface

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sBIServiceList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: All supported NF services registered on service-based interface

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: weightFactor
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Capacity of local node relative to other nodes in the same type (3GPP 23.501)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: snssaiList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Single Network Slice Selection Assistance Information (S-NSSAI) (3GPP TS 23.003)
